thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: Camilo Galeano Camacho
thread.title_full: Spotahome evaluado por Camilo Galeano Camacho

author: Camilo Galeano Camacho
title: Camilo Galeano Camacho
text: I had an apartment booked but the landlord didn't send me any messages back and just disappeared but the staff of spot a home did everything in order to solve the issue, they even got me a room with the same price and location as the one I picked, they were always in contact and ready to solve any issue that could appear.
